p: The growth, abundance and spawning success of krill in Models 1 and 2 were thus influenced directly by both environmental variables (temperature, chlorophyll), whale predation, as well as the availability of prey for the krill themselves over time (Table 1). There is no feedback into the NPZD model from krill consumption to phytoplankton biomass, but our model incorporates feedback from whale consumption into krill biomass.
